pages.title: EMI
pages.text: To find new blocks and discover new content you can use EMI.$(br)$(br)EMI is located at the left and right side of your inventory screen.$(br)$(br)To learn more on how to use it read the next page...

pages.title: How to EMI
pages.text: With the search bar at the center bottom you can search every item incuded in the modpack.$(br)$(br)You can $(#1A5FB4)left click$() to see how to craft the item and $(#A51D2D)right click$() to show  what you can craft from it.
